metadata.dc:author: Alfageme Roldán, F
metadata.dc:description: Elastography is a recently developed ultrasound technique applicable to various medical specialties. It provides information on the physical properties of tissues in the context of physiologic and pathologic alterations. In this review we explain the physical principles of the method, the information provided by the different elastography techniques, and its new applications in clinical dermatology.
metadata.dc:subject: Ecografía cutánea
Ecografía dermatológica
Dermatologic ultrasound

metadata.dc:title: Elastografía en dermatología.
Elastography in Dermatology.
